front.title: Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure: Algorithm Identifiers for Hash-based Signatures

abstract.t: This document specifies algorithm identifiers and ASN.1 encoding formats for the Hash-Based Signature (HBS) schemes Hierarchical Signature System (HSS), eXtended Merkle Signature Scheme (XMSS), and XMSS^MT, a multi-tree variant of XMSS, as well as SLH-DSA (formerly SPHINCS+), the latter being the only stateless scheme. This specification applies to the Internet X.509 Public Key infrastructure (PKI) when those digital signatures are used in Internet X.509 certificates and certificate revocation lists.
